meaningMnemonic:
Your <kanji>special</kanji> <kanji>quality</kanji> is your <vocabulary>characteristic</vocabulary>s or your <vocabulary>trait</vocabulary>s.

This is a formal word that refers to special properties that only a certain thing possesses, like the properties of steel as a material, or a certain person’s nature.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
